channel.title: Need code for ( ::master)
channel.description:
i need the code for ::master and where i put it so my admins can get maxed out plz post thank you
thanks Tylerowns112392

item.title: Need code for ( ::master)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“redfrodude27, post:11, topic:169278”][quote author=D D 3 link=topic=228973.msg1965184#msg1965184 date=1199085504]

f (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. your a nerd."); }
[/quote]

Forgot the i?[/quote]
I think you mean in my code I have an i in my method call.
This is because that is a byte holding the value. Hence looping.

item.title: Need code for ( ::master)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

D D 3:

Im not being a smart ass and my code looks fine to me.And maybe you should look in a mirror instead of saying things look like “shit”.

Ouch that hurt, I’m sure I possibly could not look any better than someone who sits here on moparisthebest.com. If you want to see what I look like go to MITB http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,118397.0.html

[quote=“D D 3, post:9, topic:169278”][quote author=Runer King link=topic=228973.msg1965221#msg1965221 date=1199086280]

No im fine.

You do not need to be a smart ass. As your code looks like shit.

Don’t flame please. We can all tell he’s an idiot, but wait until he’s not looking at the post to talk trash. LOL.

Here’s the code.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""Good job!" "); }
[/quote]

Err to bad your code looks mostly exacty the same go head and say stuff behind my back it won’t hurt to bad seeing as your probably 11 =[/quote]
He may be 11, but if he is, you write code exactly like an eleven year old. How embarrassing.
